hero.title: Fostering Human Connection
hero.tagline: NotAlone is a research project exploring how AI can help combat loneliness and build stronger communities.

breakthrough.title: Understanding and Facilitating Social Cues
breakthrough.content: Our AI models are trained to understand the nuances of human conversation, enabling them to facilitate more natural and meaningful interactions in digital spaces.

impact.title: Reducing Social Isolation
impact.content: Project NotAlone aims to provide tools that help individuals build supportive social networks, offering a new avenue for connection in an increasingly remote world.
